name: Moorhuhn Deluxe
description:
In this hunting game for iPhone, iPad and iPod touch, not everything is about shooting. Crazy Chickens are tricky! Try to find all the secret puzzles to maximize your score!

Just use your remote to position the crosshair over your target and tap once for shooting - reload by shaking the remote!

Features:

* Control the action with your remote touchpad.
* Secret extras.
* Includes English, Spanish, French, Italian and German translations.
* A lot of game to shoot!
* Easy to pick up, difficult to master!
* Find the bonus level
* Hidden Skycleaner Weapon.
* Game Center
* No Ads!
* No In-App Purchases!
